description: Unpoller v2.9  Displays detailed information for network switches in a UniFi network.

panels.description: Shows data transferred for ports: Selected Switch ports. Rx is on the negative axis.
panels.title: Data Transfer

panels.description: This panel displays lifetime totals and current data as of now.
panels.title: All Port Information

panels.description: If you do not see data here, the port is probably not up!
panels.title: Switch $Port Information

panels.description: Shows data transfer rate per second for Switch $Port. TX on positive axis and RX on negative axis.
panels.title: Data Transfer: Switch $Port

panels.description: Shows broadcast and multicast packets per second for Switch $Port. TX on positive axis and RX on negative axis.
panels.title: Multicast & Broadcast: Switch $Port

panels.description: Shows errors and dropped packets for Switch $Port. RX on negative axis.
panels.title: Errors and Drops: Switch $Port

panels.description: Shows packet counters for Switch $Port. TX on positive axis and RX on negative axis.
panels.title: Packets Per Second: Switch $Port

list.definition: show tag values from "usw_ports" with key="source"
list.name: Controller
list.query: show tag values from "usw_ports" with key="source"

list.definition: show tag values from "usw_ports" with key="site_name" WHERE source =~ /^${Controller:regex}$/
list.name: Site
list.query: show tag values from "usw_ports" with key="site_name" WHERE source =~ /^${Controller:regex}$/

list.definition: show tag values from "usw_ports" with key="device_name" where site_name =~ /^${Site:regex}$/ AND type =~ /^${Devices:regex}$/
list.name: Switch
list.query: show tag values from "usw_ports" with key="device_name" where site_name =~ /^${Site:regex}$/ AND type =~ /^${Devices:regex}$/

list.definition: show tag values from "usw_ports" with key="port_id" where device_name =~ /^${Switch:regex}$/ AND site_name =~ /^${Site:regex}$/
list.name: Port
list.query: show tag values from "usw_ports" with key="port_id" where device_name =~ /^${Switch:regex}$/ AND site_name =~ /^${Site:regex}$/

title: UniFi-Poller: USW Insights - InfluxDB
